# Peter Boncz

![Peter Boncz's photo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Fpeter3_105665c478.png&w=3840&q=75)

# Peter Boncz

Visiting Researcher

Peter joins us as a Visiting Researcher from CWI where he is a professor on Large-Scale Analytical Data Management. As part of his PhD, he designed MonetDB and continues research on database systems. He was named as an ACM Fellow "for contributions to the design of columnar, main-memory, and vectorized database systems."

MotherDuck released its paper on Hybrid Query Processing at the Conference on Innovative Data (systems) Research \[CIDR\].
